name: Agility Dogs Lite
description:
***** NEWS!!!!! Agility Dog is now also available for the Mac. Get it at the Mac App Store *****

He’s your best friend. He waited all day for you to get back from work. Now, all he wants is to have some fun… he just happens to be made out of clay.

Take your dog through a fun and exciting run through an agility park. Run, walk, jump, climb obstacles before time runs out. Collect doggie snacks and steaks.

Agility Dogs is a unique and exciting endless runner entirely made out of hand-made clay models. It simulates physics, depth, and perspective to add to the fun!

Features:
-A fun and exciting agility park.
-Dogs: wire fox terrier, Siberian husky, chihuahua, beagle, poodle.
-Physics simulation, depth, and perspective for added realism.
-Obstacles are selected and placed at random, so the game is never the same.
-Game Center leader board.
-Intuitive controls.
-High resolution Retina display graphics.
-Every object in the game is a hand-made clay model photographed at high resolution. The game looks especially gorgeous on devices with Retina displays (new iPad, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S).

www.facebook.com/AgilityDogsApp
